summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SafarAI platform with all new features. All 17 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI fully functional with improved visualizations. Approvals and Tasks pages successfully removed. New features (Brief Archive, PDF Export, Scheduled Runs, Source Health Monitoring) all working correctly.
passed_tests: Approvals page removed from navigation - VERIFIED
Tasks/Action Items page removed from navigation - VERIFIED
Insights page with improved visualization (Key Findings, Risk Alerts, Opportunities, Impact Scenarios) - VERIFIED
Trends page with category filters (All Trends, Partnerships, Funding, Pricing, Technology, Destinations) and confidence gauges - VERIFIED
Brief Archive page loads and displays 2 historical briefs - VERIFIED
Brief Archive shows brief details with event counts and Export button - VERIFIED
Export PDF button on Intel Brief page - VERIFIED
PDF download functionality works correctly - VERIFIED
GET /api/briefs endpoint returns list of briefs - VERIFIED
GET /api/brief/{id}/pdf endpoint returns PDF file - VERIFIED
GET /api/schedules endpoint returns scheduled runs - VERIFIED
POST /api/schedules endpoint creates new schedule with valid cron - VERIFIED
POST /api/schedules rejects invalid cron expressions - VERIFIED
GET /api/sources/health endpoint returns health metrics - VERIFIED
GET /api/email/config verifies domain is kirikomal.com - VERIFIED
All 17 backend API tests passed (100% success rate)
seed_data_creation: None - used existing data from previous runs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features implemented and working correctly. Platform has 9 active sources, 12 total runs, 17 events extracted, 37 items indexed. Brief Archive contains 2 historical briefs. Email domain kirikomal.com is verified. Scheduled runs endpoint supports cron expressions.

new_features_tested.brief_archive: Working - displays historical briefs with details view
new_features_tested.scheduled_runs: Working - CRUD operations with cron validation
new_features_tested.source_health_monitoring: Working - returns health metrics for all sources
